rComments: He's funny, nice, and interesting. But the class itself is kinda hard.  There's a lot of reading involved and some of it is pretty difficult to understand/pick out what's important. Overall, I wasn't very interested in the subject, but Ranu made it tolerable.  I'd definitely take him again.

such a great professor! i had no interest coming into this class but after the class, i learned a lot. he assigns a lot of books and the reading is intense, BUT if you do all the reading, you're basically guaranteed an A. he gives you study guides for the exams too. 2 essays, attendance, and 2 exams (1 midterm, 1 final) final is not cumulative too!

He's very passionate about the subject matter, but too many times that translated to off topic lectures that didn't coincide with class readings or even the class topic. Tests are based entirely on the readings, which are quite extensive. 2 papers, a midterm, and a final. Not a hard class, but not a fun one, either.

Ranu was hands down one of the best professors i've ever had. He is extremely helpful and interesting to listen to. Definitely take one of his classes if you ever get the chance, you will not regret it!

Ranu is awesome! seriously one of the best psychology teachers you will have. his stories make concepts easy to remember and he is easily one of the most engaging teachers I have had EVER. I hope he teaches some upper-divs soon :D [Winter 2009]

BEST PROFESSOR EVER!  If you have the chance to take a class with him, do it.  He is by far the best professor I have ever had. Super funny and made you want to come to class.  I would love to take a class with him again.

One of the best teachers I have ever had the chance to have. He was hilarious, engaging, knew the material extensively. For nearly every new concept we learned, he would contribute one of his (usually funny) anecdotes. Although, there were A LOT of dumb questions by students, and he was patient and respectful towards everyone.

"I am biased." This is what the professor repeats just about EVERY class. He doesn't believe a lot of the findings that we have to learn in our book and he shares a lot of personal experience. Looking back on the class, I think if he hadn't been there to spice it up, the class material is a real bore, with a lot of repetition.

Great funny professor. He makes you want to come to class and there were two papers, two midterms. you must read the books and TA was extremely helpful. pretty easy class. do your work! one of the few best profs i've had. def take this class with him!

Ranu was an amazing professor and friend. Class was never boring and I always learned something new everyday. While taking his writing course, I improved in my writing soo much and am lucky to have had Ranu as my professor!

Ranu is definitely one of the best professors at UCSC! He conveys info well, makes an unfamiliar topic easier to understand, made class enjoyable. I was never bored, attended every class.In addition to lectures, uses different media-makes topic more interesting.If you put in time&effort(read&study)you will get an A. So glad I took this class!

Ranu was very helpful, an awesome teacher and nice at heart. He is sometimes harsh with his comments and very hard grader but if you are committed to work in his class then it is not hard to earn an A. His class was very interesting and he asked very thoughtful questions to facilitate questions. I liked being in his class:)

He is a really funny guy, he always have some analytical questions and help us to develop our deeper thought. although he is a grade harder,but he really help to improve my writing. strongly suffest to enroll his class. he is a amzing teacher.

Ranu is an amazing teacher, dynamic lecturer. Easy to understand, tests pretty easy, essays graded pretty hard but straightforward assignments. He uses lots of different media, and personal examples to clarify topics. He's easy on the eyes, too.

He is AWESOME. Very clear and i learned SO much from him. His class was fun and interactive. His tests werent hard, it was only to test on if you read or not. Essays were straightforward. Definitely take a class with him.
